title: Kyuuketsuki Sugu Shinu (The Vampire Dies in No Time)
synopsis: Vampires are said to have many weaknesses such as garlic, crosses, and sunlight. Game-loving vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to... everything. He dies, turning into a pile of ash, at the slightest shock.
voices: ['Tamura, Mutsumi', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Furukawa, Makoto', 'Hioka, Natsumi', 'Toki, Shunichi', 'Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu', 'Majima, Junji', 'Onosaka, Masaya', 'Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Hikasa, Youko']
staff: [['Koujina, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Naya, Ryousuke', ['Sound Director']], ['Ono, Daisuke', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Fukuyama, Jun', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
